version_description:
We’ve made minor improvements to the app & squished some bugs in this version! Be sure to check out the recent updates below...

— RECENT UPDATES —

- Browse music by Genres/Themes. The most popular Lomotif songs revealed! (Playlists are u

Music search just got easier! We've added search suggestions so you don't need to know how to spell "XXXTentacion" or "Jacquees".

— RECENT UPDATES —

- Browse music by Genres/Themes. The most popular Lomotif songs revealed! (Playlists are upd

More bug fixes and other improvements!

— RECENT UPDATES —

- Improved music discovery. Browse music by Genres/Themes. The most popular Lomotif songs revealed! (Playlists are updated regularly so do check back)
- Download your Lomotifs (or

We've got a brand new look with *drumroll* tab bars!

More bug fixes and other improvements!

— RECENT UPDATES —

- Improved music discovery. Browse music by Genres/Themes. The most popular Lomotif songs revealed! (Playlists are updated

Add meme titles to your video! Get more views on IG etc.

— RECENT UPDATES —

- Improved music discovery. Browse music by Genres/Themes. The most popular Lomotif songs revealed! (Playlists are updated regularly so do check back)
- Download

A new look/feel for our app! Tell us what you think: help@lomotif.com
We're also releasing a new feature for select users! Check back on the "Lightbulb" icon to see if something different appears (requires 1-2 app restarts) ;)

Fixes and more fixes, such as:
- scrolling performance improvement
- fix some iOS 11 UI issues
- fix iOS 11 notification issue
- fix profile page text size issue

And oh yeah, we've a new app icon! Waddya think? Send feedback/questions

We've fixed multiple crash issues e.g.
- when exporting a scrubby video
- crashes on iPhone 4s & iPads

Be sure to check out SCRUBBY - Scrub your clips like a DJ spins his records! Fast Mo >> Slow Mo > Rewind << to music.

Squished bugs and a new feature (enabled for some lucky users)!

Be sure to check out...
SCENES/ROLLS - See trending Scenes you can use in the app including GIFS, flash effects, or make music videos with “acid” scenes. If you’d like to save a sc

New feature!
Tweak your in/out points and finetune your Lomotif like never before.
Tap "reset all" to remove your manual edits.

Be sure to check out...
SCENES/ROLLS - See trending Scenes you can use in the app including GIFS, flash effec

#BestPartof2017 challenge: Bring the curtains down on 2017 with a MASSIVE LOMOTIF of ALL pictures and video clips, tag everyone that made a difference to your year on New Year's Eve. We can't wait to see your Lomotifs. :-*

Critical bug fix - this u

Woot! New Year, new update!

We've fixed the Inspired tab with this update! Search for Scenes to add to your Lomotif, and collaborate with friends to create Rolls (collections of Scenes).

As usual, please send your feedback to help@lomotif.c

Just a couple of minor bug fixes.

If you haven't updated your app in awhile, here's what you can look forward to:
Inspired tab has been fixed - add scenes and rolls again!
Share your Lomotifs via URL (your friends don't need to download the

Create videos with friends! Upload Scenes from your camera roll, and invite friends to your Roll so they can use the same clips. Some users may also see our new "Camera" mode.

If you haven't updated your app in awhile, here's what you can look for

Valentines' Day is coming up, guys! We've squished some bugs in our new in/out feature, so you can tweak those love-motifs to perfection. We're also featuring some of the cutest couple Lomotifs in our feed rn, so please tag us on Instagram.

If you

Fixed glitches with that occur on certain images/pictures.

Thanks to everyone who wrote in on the above issue. Please continue to send feedback via Profile > Settings > Email Support so that we can continue to squish all bugs.

p.s. A m

Woots! Major bug fixes!
+ Fixed neverending loading issue (when using scenes).
+ Released a major music fix so you should be able to preview and use all top songs again!
+ Email verifications for sign-ups should work now!
Just a couple of bug fixes! More updates coming soon so stay tuned!

A couple more bug fixes. You can now edit/remix your old Lomotifs more easily... Profile > Projects

Recent updates:
To adjust the in/out points of your clip, tap the thumbnail and then tap "edit"
Some users will receive the "shoot with mus

A couple more bug fixes. You can now edit/remix your old Lomotifs more easily... Profile > Projects

Recent updates:
To adjust the in/out points of your clip, tap the thumbnail and then tap "edit"
Some users will receive the "shoot with mus

New feature, SCRUBBY - Remixing video just got wayyyyy cooler!

Easily create amazing video remixes with your existing footages.
Have a funny moment that you captured? Now you can mix that moment up by going back and forth at your own pace!

- Fix scrubby slider alignment issue
- Fix crash issue when adding scene to roll

New feature, SCRUBBY - Remixing video just got wayyyyy cooler!

Easily create amazing video remixes with your existing footages.
Have a funny moment that

We've fixed multiple crash issues e.g.
- when exporting a scrubby video
- crashes on iPhone 4s & iPads

Be sure to check out SCRUBBY - Scrub your clips like a DJ spins his records! Fast Mo >> Slow Mo > Rewind << to music.

Here’s what’s new:
+ Many crash bug fixes!

***

More fixes and features coming soon! If you’d like to help us improve Lomotif app, reach out to us at help@lomotif.com

If you appreciate the update, do please leave a review in the App

Crash bug fixes and more!

Our users' favorite new features:
+ Scrubby mode allows you to "scrub" your clips to music like a DJ! Slow-mo, fast-mo or rewind... Hit all the beats!
+ Camera mode allows to use record a clip to music.
+ Collabo

Bug fixes & other improvements!
- Fixed Instagram login and Facebook sharing
- Improved user experience when editing titles/memes and in/out points

TIP: Be sure to check our list of “Trending” songs if you can’t find what you’re looking f

Need a good song for your Lomotif? Get song recommendations now on our Featured Feed (tap the album icon to use the song in your next project)!

We’ve also squished several bugs including the one that messes up your images when you add a filter.

Bug fixes and more! For example, deeplink to playlists & genres now work!

Introducing Lomotif Channels, a great way for everyone to manage and contribute Lomotifs together!
Create and build your own channels, from interests to moments and activities of your loved ones, fully express yourself by grouping and featuring them on
